branchCategory.name: Narrow Width Precision Slide Table - MXH
branchCategory.description: <P>The MXH narrow width precision slide table incorporates recirculating bearings to its new linear guide system to increase rigidity by expanding the width where the load bearings come in contact with the linear guide. The new linear guide system also increases allowable pitch moment by 170%, yaw moment by 210% and roll moment by 240% as well as reduces its weight by as much as 19% from the previous model. Its narrow width footprint allows for multiple units to be mounted adjacently for applications with tight space constraints.</P>

breadCrumb.name: Narrow Width Precision Slide Table - MXH

branchItem.name: MXH, Narrow Width Precision Slide Table (Recirculating Bearings)
branchItem.description: <P>The MXH narrow width precision slide table incorporates recirculating bearings to its new linear guide system to increase rigidity by expanding the width where the load bearings come in contact with the linear guide. The new linear guide system also increases allowable pitch moment by 170%, yaw moment by 210% and roll moment by 240% as well as reduces its weight by as much as 19% from the previous model. Its narrow width footprint allows for multiple units to be mounted adjacently for applications with tight space constraints.</P>
